title: Alcide kAudit (Preview)
descriptionMarkdown: Alcide kAudit connector allows you to automatically export your Kubernetes cluster audit logs into Azure Sentinel in real-time. This enables enhanced visibility and observability into your Kubernetes audit logs, providing robust security and monitoring capabilities for forensics purposes.

sampleQueries.description: All audit activity for a Secret resource type, summarized count by resource namespace
sampleQueries.query:
alcide_kaudit_activity_1_CL
| where resource_type_s  == "secrets"
| summarize count() by resource_namespace_s

sampleQueries.description: Audit activity, summarized by principal, Type and Caller IP
sampleQueries.query:
alcide_kaudit_selections_details_1_CL
| summarize count() by principal_s, Type, caller_ip_s

dataTypes.name: alcide_kaudit_activity_1_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
alcide_kaudit_activity_1_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
 | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: alcide_kaudit_detections_1_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
alcide_kaudit_detections_1_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
 | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: alcide_kaudit_selections_count_1_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
alcide_kaudit_selections_count_1_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
 | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: alcide_kaudit_selections_details_1_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
alcide_kaudit_selections_details_1_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
 | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
alcide_kaudit_activity_1_CL
 | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
 | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description: Follow the step-by-step instructions provided in the [Alcide kAudit Installation Guide](https://get.alcide.io/hubfs/Azure%20Sentinel%20Integration%20with%20kAudit.pdf)
